medi:segment.description: To specify the name/address and their relatedfunction, either by C082 only and/orunstructured by C058 or structured by C080 thru3207.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Party function code qualifier - Code giving specific meaning to a party.
PARTY IDENTIFICATION DETAILS - Identification of a transaction party by code.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Party identifier - Code specifying the identity of a party.
Code list identification code - Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code list responsible agency code - Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: NAME AND ADDRESS - Unstructured name and address: one to five lines.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Name and address description - Free form description of a name and address line.
Name and address description - Free form description of a name and address line.
Name and address description - Free form description of a name and address line.
Name and address description - Free form description of a name and address line.
Name and address description - Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:field.medi:documentation: PARTY NAME - Identification of a transaction party by name, oneto five lines. Party name may be formatted.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Party name - Name of a party.
Party name - Name of a party.
Party name - Name of a party.
Party name - Name of a party.
Party name - Name of a party.
Party name format code - Code specifying the representation of a party name.

medi:field.medi:documentation: STREET - Street address and/or PO Box number in a structuredaddress: one to four lines.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Street and number or post office box identifier - To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.
Street and number or post office box identifier - To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.
Street and number or post office box identifier - To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.
Street and number or post office box identifier - To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.

medi:field.medi:documentation: City name - Name of a city.
COUNTRY SUBDIVISION DETAILS - To specify a country subdivision, such as state,canton, county, prefecture.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Country subdivision identifier - To identify a country subdivision, such as state,canton, county, prefecture.
Code list identification code - Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code list responsible agency code - Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Country subdivision name - Name of a country subdivision, such as state, canton,county, prefecture.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Postal identification code - Code specifying the postal zone or address.
Country identifier - Identification of the name of the country or othergeographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1 andUN/ECE Recommendation 3.
